problem_names:
lemma ide_char [iff]:
    shows "ide f \<longleftrightarrow> f \<in> Obj"

lemma domains_char:
    shows "domains f = {x. x \<in> Obj \<and> x = f}"

lemma arr_char [iff]:
    shows "arr f \<longleftrightarrow> f \<in> Obj"

lemma dom_char [simp]:
    shows "dom f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)"

lemma cod_char [simp]:
    shows "cod f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)"

lemma comp_char [simp]:
    shows "comp g f = (if f \<in> Obj \<and> f = g then f else null)"

lemma seq_char [iff]:
    shows "seq f g \<longleftrightarrow> ide f \<and> f = g"
translations:
proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null
  null = (THE n. \<forall>f. n \<cdot> f = n \<and> f \<cdot> n = n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. null = Null

lemma ide_char [iff]:
    shows "ide f \<longleftrightarrow> f \<in> Obj"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ide f = (f \<in> Obj)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null
  null = Null
  ide ?a \<equiv>
  ?a \<cdot> ?a \<noteq> null \<and>
  (\<forall>f.
      (f \<cdot> ?a \<noteq> null \<longrightarrow> f \<cdot> ?a = f) \<and>
      (?a \<cdot> f \<noteq> null \<longrightarrow> ?a \<cdot> f = f))
  Null \<notin> Obj

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ide f = (f \<in> Obj)

lemma domains_char:
    shows "domains f = {x. x \<in> Obj \<and> x = f}"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)
  ide ?a \<equiv>
  ?a \<cdot> ?a \<noteq> null \<and>
  (\<forall>f.
      (f \<cdot> ?a \<noteq> null \<longrightarrow> f \<cdot> ?a = f) \<and>
      (?a \<cdot> f \<noteq> null \<longrightarrow> ?a \<cdot> f = f))
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null
  null = Null

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {a. ide a \<and> f \<cdot> a \<noteq> null} = {x \<in> Obj. x = f}

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. category (\<cdot>)

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>g f.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        g \<cdot> f \<noteq> null\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> seq g f
 2. \<And>f.
       (\<And>y x.
           y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
           if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null) \<Longrightarrow>
       (domains f \<noteq> {}) = (codomains f \<noteq> {})
 3. \<And>h g f.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq h g; seq (h \<cdot> g) f\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> seq g f
 4. \<And>h g f.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq h (g \<cdot> f); seq g f\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> seq h g
 5. \<And>g f h.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq g f; seq h g\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> seq (h \<cdot> g) f
 6. \<And>g f h.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq g f; seq h g\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (h \<cdot> g) \<cdot> f = h \<cdot> g \<cdot> f

proof (prove)
using this:
  arr ?f \<equiv> domains ?f \<noteq> {} \<or> codomains ?f \<noteq> {}
  null = Null
  (?a \<in> domains ?a) = ide ?a
  ide ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)

using null_char self_codomain_iff_ide domains_char codomains_def ide_char

proof (prove)
using this:
  null = Null
  (?a \<in> codomains ?a) = ide ?a
  domains ?f = {x \<in> Obj. x = ?f}
  codomains ?f \<equiv> {b. ide b \<and> b \<cdot> ?f \<noteq> null}
  ide ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>f.
       (\<And>y x.
           y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
           if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null) \<Longrightarrow>
       (domains f \<noteq> {}) = (codomains f \<noteq> {})
 2. \<And>h g f.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq h g; seq (h \<cdot> g) f\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> seq g f

       \<lbrakk>\<And>y x.
                   y \<cdot> x \<equiv>
                   if x \<in> Obj \<and> x = y then x else Null;
        seq h (g \<cdot> f); seq g f\<rbrakk>

lemma arr_char [iff]:
    shows "arr f \<longleftrightarrow> f \<in> Obj"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arr f = (f \<in> Obj)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null
  \<lbrakk>arr ?f; cod ?f = ?b\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> ?b \<cdot> ?f = ?f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arr f = (f \<in> Obj)
by (metis empty_iff has_codomain_iff_arr not_arr_null null_char self_codomain_iff_ide ide_char)

lemma dom_char [simp]:
    shows "dom f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.dom f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)

proof (prove)
using this:
  arr ?f \<equiv> domains ?f \<noteq> {} \<or> codomains ?f \<noteq> {}
  local.dom ?f =
  (if domains ?f \<noteq> {} then SOME a. a \<in> domains ?f else null)
  arr ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)
  ide ?a \<Longrightarrow> local.dom ?a = ?a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.dom f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)

lemma cod_char [simp]:
    shows "cod f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cod f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)

proof (prove)
using this:
  arr ?f \<equiv> domains ?f \<noteq> {} \<or> codomains ?f \<noteq> {}
  \<lbrakk>in_hom ?f ?a ?b;
   \<lbrakk>arr ?f; local.dom ?f = ?a; cod ?f = ?b\<rbrakk>
   \<Longrightarrow> ?T\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?T
  cod ?f =
  (if codomains ?f \<noteq> {} then SOME b. b \<in> codomains ?f else null)
  ide ?a \<Longrightarrow> cod ?a = ?a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cod f = (if f \<in> Obj then f else null)

lemma comp_char [simp]:
    shows "comp g f = (if f \<in> Obj \<and> f = g then f else null)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. g \<cdot> f = (if f \<in> Obj \<and> f = g then f else null)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<cdot> ?x \<equiv> if ?x \<in> Obj \<and> ?x = ?y then ?x else Null
  null = Null

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. g \<cdot> f = (if f \<in> Obj \<and> f = g then f else null)

proof (prove)
using this:
  arr ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)
  ide ?f = (?f \<in> Obj)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ide = arr

lemma seq_char [iff]:
    shows "seq f g \<longleftrightarrow> ide f \<and> f = g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. seq f g = (ide f \<and> f = g)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ide = arr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. seq f g = (ide f \<and> f = g)
